reference.shortdesc: A command provides an instruction for completing a step.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: A command provides the active voice instruction to the user for completing the step, and should not be more than one sentence. If the step needs additional explanation, place the explanation in an info element following the cmd.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The cmd element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>In a text editor, create a new file.</cmd></step>
